entry.tran: 乌合之众;流氓地痞;不三不四的人
entry.def: If you refer to a group of people as riff-raff, you disapprove of them because you think they are not respectable.

means.word_mean: 1. disparaging terms for the common people

auth_sentence.content: But now there were more and more riffraff enjoying the deep cool beneath the bridge.
